mapper.select: SELECT `id`, a_id, nickname, `email`, psw, description FROM account WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flag = #{_NORMAL} AND dis_flag = #{_ENABLE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (c_time, del_flag, dis_flag, a_id, nickname, email, psw, description) VALUES (NOW(), #{_NORMAL}, #{_ENABLE}, #{aId}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{psw}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET del_flag = #{_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE account SET dis_flag = #{_DISABLE} WHERE id = #{id}
